levels.levelDescription: Ethereal Woods is shrouded in a perpetual twilight, where ghostly shadows dance among the dark grass. Beware the hidden traps of shimmering water that threaten to ensnare the unwary traveler.
Spectral Caverns echo with the clinking of rusty chains, forming precarious platforms amidst the darkness. Beware the treacherous deep dark holes that yawn hungrily, ready to claim any misstep.

At the heart of the realm lies the Shadowed Citadel, a fortress of fractured walls and dangerous lava flows. This is where Xarathos, the Spectral Dread, resides, wielding his legendary power with malevolent intent.
